sentences.sContent: These are the report’s main conclusions.
sentences.sCn: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.sContent: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.sCn: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.sContent: There are perhaps two main conclusions to be drawn from the above discussion.
sentences.sCn: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。

sentences.sContent: All the evidence pointed to the conclusion that he was guilty.
sentences.sCn: 所有证据都表明他是有罪的。

sentences.sContent: It’s important not to jump to conclusions .
The police came to the inescapable conclusion that the children had been murdered.
sentences.sCn: 警方得出了无法回避的结论: 这些儿童被谋杀了。

sentences.sContent: ...we may naturally arrive at the conclusion that we shouldn’t spend too much time on their computer terminal rather than relating to people in the real world...

phrases.pCn: 意识到了；得出相同的结论
得出结论；达成一个结论
预料之中必然发生的事情；不可避免的结局
vt. 结束（使终止）；谈定（买卖等）

remMethod.val: 来自conclude(v. 推论出； 结束)

words.tran: 决定性的；最后的；确实的；确定性的
结束；推断；作结论（conclude的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 结论， 推论； 结尾； 缔结， 议定
trans.tranOther: something you decide after considering all the information you have
